name: Locanda San Tomaso

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights on our Italian honeymoon.
reviews.title: Beuatifully decorated & quaint. Lovely place to stay

reviews.text: The family were lovely, and very helpful. The rooms are all spotless, and decorated in a very pleasant (but chintzy) way.
reviews.title: Lovely rooms, friendly hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is outside on the terrace, with lovely views over the town and walls. Highly recommended, and terrifc value.
reviews.title: Lovely rooms and friendly hosts

reviews.text: We had a very nice stay at the Locanda San Tomaso. The location is excellent (right in teh historic centre of beautiful Treviso), the rooms lovely and the service very good. The owners are very friendly and helpful. Restaurant a little expensive: good but not great.
reviews.title: a perfect base to explore the joys of italy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for two nights B&B. Had a corner room overlooking the river at the back. The room was small and had a low celing but was very comfortable, modern and well decorated. Bed was comfortable and everything was very clean. My only complaint would be that the shower was a little small, but I am a big guy so it might not be a problem for others.
reviews.title: recomended by friends who live nearby it didn't disappoint

reviews.text: excellent guesthouse, owners lovley, the girl making the wonderful breakfast lovley, cant recomend highley enough. (please dont moan at the tiny bit of noise coming from the bar down the street) your on holiday get a life and go in and have a spritzer or two. truely wonderful.
reviews.title: BEST PLACE TO STAY IN TREVISO

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What I liked was the feeling of comfort. The rooms are airy and so beautifully decorated. Free Wifi was also very welcomed. Excellent work on rooms done by Martina. Also the welcome by Cristina was very warm. She is truly a beautiful girl. Breakfast was excellent with a wide choice of food. The croisannts were to die for . . . so good and fresh. Thank you Locanda San Tomasao for making our stay with you such an enjoyable one.
reviews.title: Beautiful B&B in Beautiful Treviso

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just spent 4 nights in this charming B&B. The owners and staff were extremely friendly. The guesthouse was very comfortable with a good selection of buffet style breakfast. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. Location is very ideal for those wanting to visit Venice, Padova, Verona and the small towns and villages such as Asolo & Bassano di Grappa. The train station is just 15 minutes away on foot. There are plenty of shops, bars and restaurants in the vicinity, while on saturday morning there's also a huge market just infront of the guesthouse. Excellent value for money.
reviews.title: Charming and friendly B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wonderful new B+B to stay in in Treviso ! we loved this romantic little place where we stayed for 1 evening. We were welcomed with a smile and lots of information even when arriving late at night. Compliments to the owner and his wife for the wonderful renovation project they have done to this place. The B+B is located on the first floor up some stairs (no lift) and is on two levels of an old palazzo. ALl the inside has been redone with attention to detail and is lovely to stay in a place that feels new with all new furnishings etc but at the same time with personality and love from the owners. Little wonderful interesting touches everywhere. Room lovely and spacious with a comfortable romantic bed and everything you need including heating. Breakfast a wonderful array of fresh ingredients and nice service with a smile even when you arrive at 7.30am. I would highly reccomend this place for a stay in Treviso which is only 30 mins train ride to venice (station only a 10 min walk from the B+B). thanks
reviews.title: Wonderful place to stay in Treviso ! Highly Reccomended !

reviews.text: A nice B&B in the heart of Treviso, we travelled with our children and it was a very nice place to be staying. We had the apartment in the roof which it was very nice and clean. Bathroom includes a shower (only a pity that it has a curtain and not a cubicle - but it was still good) and a washing machine dryer, very good for the children clothes. A nice kitchen and lounge (this last can be used as a another bedroom) Car can be parked in the street opposite the hotel for a small charge at the meters. We will return.
reviews.title: a good place in Treviso

reviews.text: This is a very personal and personalized experience. nice room with cosy atmosphere and very nice and helpful hosts.
reviews.title: coming back soon - hopefully

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Visiting Venice and Europe for the first time was a dream come true!
reviews.title: Loved this place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would recommend visiting Venice by train, easily accessed.
reviews.title: Great little B&B with lots of personality

reviews.text: As we had rented car we were able to use Locanda San Tomasco location for
reviews.title: Perfect location and wonderful hospitality

reviews.text: some day trips, including the going to the beginning of the 'Dramatic Dolimites'.
reviews.title: Charming, charming, charming!
Lovely room, great location, fantastic service
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for three nights as we were in Treviso for a wedding and we were travelling with our 11 month old daughter. The room we were in was beautiful, very clean, lovely outlook onto the terrace, the bathroom was great and the air conditioning very welcoming after the heat of the day!

description: The Bed & Breakfast has 6 rooms named after the native vineyards. With wooden beams and wooden floors and decorated with locally hand crafted objects, the rooms offer four-poster beds and mosquito nets.The rooms are all equipped with soundproofing, heating system, air conditioning, private bathroom with shower, flat screen LCD television, hair dryer on request.
